title: Decanter And Stopper
provenance: W.G.T. Burne, London; 1965 P. Warren NY.
description: Square-sided body with chamfered corners cut with fini horizontal blazes, shoulder cut with wide flutes, wide lip; one side engraved with "The Bushmill Old Distillery, Co. Antrim, Ireland, " and a picture of the distillery marked "pure malt" surrounded by shamrocks; bottom cut with star; stopper mushroom-shaped with hexagonal faceting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-167-a,b.
